name: Interface ModuleElement.Directive
text:
Represents a directive within the declaration of this
 module. The directives of a module declaration configure the
 module in the Java Platform Module System.

methods.description: Returns the kind of this directive.

methods.method_sig:
<R, P> R accept (ModuleElement.DirectiveVisitor<R, P> v,
                     P p)
methods.description: Applies a visitor to this directive.
